comment: The last time it snowed this much in YVR , if memory serves , was . I remember driving down Granville and seeing a store awning collapse under the weight of the snow .

comment: I had just moved out from living for years in Montreal . I had divested myself of snow boots , heavy coats , the whole winter burden . Then Vancouver got the last laugh !
